author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

PR #28762 introduced changes that broke workflow 136.891, which PR #28804 attempted to fix. While PR #28804 did fix workflow 136.891, it broke workflows 136.8642,136.8643,136.886,136.8861,136.8862,136.888,136.889,136.89,136.893,136.895,136.896 and 137.8.

These workflows currently use "prompt-like" GTs, which are similar to the prompt GTs that were used for prompt reconstruction of the Run2018 datasets. Now that an offline GT is available for Run 2018D, a prompt-like GT is no longer needed. The errors in the failing workflows are resolved after switching to the offline GTs. The key `auto:run2_data_promptlike_hi` is kept because there is no offline GT for the Run II HI data.

Attn: @mmusich @silviodonato 

#### PR validation:

The PR was tested with `addOnTests.py -j 8` and `runTheMatrix.py -l 136.8642,136.8643,136.886,136.8861,136.8862,136.888,136.889,136.89,136.893,136.895,136.896,137.8,136.891 --ibeos`.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport.
title: Convert workflows that use pp prompt-like GTs to use offline GTs
